title: Ultimatum
description: Michael gets upset when Holly returns from the holidays without an engagement ring, but still together with her boyfriend. Meanwhile, Pam tries to help her co-workers keep with their New Year's resolutions.

quotes.speaker: Man
quotes.text: Next up, secretary Schrute will read the minutes from Sunday's meeting.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Minutes from previous meeting of Knights of the Night. No, Jim, hey!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: This meeting is for Knights of the Night only.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Knights of the Night are volunteer crime patrollers. We're often compared to the Guardian Angels, but we could not be more different from them. Seriously, we are nothing like the Guardian Angels. I mean, broad strokes purposes, sure. Think Guardian Angels.  One of our many recent good deeds? We set out to capture the Scranton Strangler. Mission accomplished. Not by us.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm actually just looking for my Blackberry, so, carry on.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: No, no, no, no, no. I see how this movie ends. You make fun of me, everyone laughs, ha, ha, ha... screw you!

quotes.speaker: Man
quotes.text: Dwight, don't be bothered by your friend's presence.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: What are you going to do now? Are you going to make fun of our leader's weird voice? Huh? [mimicking the leader's voice] Dwight, don't be bothered by the [mumbles]. Over the line, Jim.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I'm just looking for my phone, so... pretend I'm not here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Fine. Minutes from previous meeting of Knights of the Night. That's our official name, Jim.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Sounds good.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Reflective strips were glued to patrol jackets. Knights went outside with flashlights to test them.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Smart.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: And the rest was just [mumbles]stuff.

quotes.speaker: Man
quotes.text: Go ahead and read it, some people weren't here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay. Knights stayed outside to play flashlight tag.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh, come on, that sounds awesome.

quotes.speaker: Member
quotes.text: It was pretty cool.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Was it?

quotes.speaker: Member
quotes.text: It was fun.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: It was pretty awesome.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [answers phone] Hey! Yeah. No, I got it. Just leaving now.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: January three, 2011. A day which will live in-famously. Holly Partridge Flax, otherwise known as Holly, otherwise otherwise known as a living, breathing angel, is engaged to another man. This is freaking me out. I- okay, let's switch to the happy video, okay? No, no, no, no, let's push through. We'll do this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Today will either be the best or the worst day of my life. Holly gave AJ an ultimatum. He either proposes by New Year's or they break up. Now, if she's engaged, I'm gonna go crazy, and I'm gonna start attacking people. If she's not engaged, in all honesty, I may just burn this whole place to the ground out of happiness. Either way, I am going to need some talking down. And nobody talks me down like myself in a video talking me down.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [filming video] Michael, I know what you're thinking. Holly's engaged to another man, and you want to kill yourself. It may seem like a good idea, but it's not.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [giggles] Snot.  Sorry, it sounded like you said it's snot.  I am so sorry.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay, so killing yourself. [laughs] I was just thinking about snot.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Good morning.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Hey, guys! Fun thing. The index cards on your desk are resolution cards. You write your New Year's resolution on them, I'll collect them, and then display them on... da-da-da-da-da! This! Resolution board.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Wow. Did your baby draw that?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: The glitter is blinding.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: I think it's good.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: It's gonna be fun.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I recently met Sue, the office administrator at Vance Refrigeration. She has this awesome wall full of fun initiatives and morale boosters and stuff. Sue just goes for it, she's awesome.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: I know Sue. She's not that great. And you know her husband's in a wheelchair, right?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Okay, champagne.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Happy.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Sponge.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Sad. To soak up my tears.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Gummi bears and gummi worms.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Bears sad, worms happy. Come on, Erin.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Ukulele's happy?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Sad, something to break.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Chocolates.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: For you, job well done.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Thank you! And two bottles of scotch.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Both sad.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: And did you get the tickets?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I did! I did, indeed. Two front row center, to Paula Poundstone, Live in Poughkeepsie. Holly's favorite. I hope she doesn't call us up on stage. That would suck. "Hey, you think you can do my job better?" I don't know. "What's your name?" Michael.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I'm really excited for Michael either way. Because if Holly chooses to be with him, he will be so, so happy. And if not, he'll be avoiding the biggest mistake of his life!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh, hey, guys! I'd like to introduce you to a new little friend of mine.  His name is New Year's resolution board.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Shaaa-shut up. Hello.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: What happened? Is there a ring?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: So... high five me. We're back. To a happy... [grabs Holly's hand] look at those! Mittens. Are those a present?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: [whispering] Come on!

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: They're warm.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: They're so fuzzy and warm! Let me feel those. Let me feel that. Put 'er there. Give me a good firm... ooh! That's a good firm handshake. You're hired! Yes, let's get right into the Anderson account, shall we? Yes, yes, right away.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Hey, hey, hey. Want me to crank the thermostat up to 90, smoke her out? She can't keep those mittens on forever.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes, no, why? Stop! Yes.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [Holly takes off mittens revealing no ring on her ring finger] Congratu-ohhh.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh my God! That's it! That's it!

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Oh, I get it. Everybody knows about the ultimatum.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Yes, I told everyone.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [sticking both ring fingers up] Ha ha, ha ha!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hey! [sticking up middle finger] Right back atcha, bitch!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Happy! Happy, happy, happy, happy!

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, okay, calm down, breathe.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm trying!

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: I said breathe!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm trying!

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Wait a second, are you listening to music?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Shut that off!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm not listening to music!

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Fine, just go crazy for a little while! Lookin' good! You're lookin' good. [roping Michael in] Oh, I gotcha! I gotcha! I'm pulling you back! Michael dance off!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Go! Oh, that's nice.

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Go!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Me? Okay.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Go!

quotes.speaker: {Michael} in Video
quotes.text: Nice! We're gonna calm down later.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm good.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Oh, yeah!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh my God! [sprays champagne on Erin]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Hey, Dwight, I'm collecting resolution cards.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Not doing that.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Why not?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I've achieved plenty and there's no better than the best.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Drink less caffeine. That's a good one, Pam. Here's mine.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Learn to cook for one!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah. I love cooking, but I always find myself throwing out half the food that I prepare, so...  two years is time to just start preparing the right amount of food for the right number of people, which is one.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Well, maybe you'll meet someone.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No, some people don't just meet someone. I'm fine with it. Really. This is not a pity party. It's not a party at all. It's just sad.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Angela.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Make time for romance!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Who's the senator?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: My boyfriend.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Oh, you mean the state senator. I'm sorry, I was confused, because you accidentally wrote 'the senator'.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Ugh.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Wait, it's that easy? That's not a resolution, that's just... something I want to do. Okay, fine. I can do that... [sticks note card on board, makes trumpet sound] My resolution is... meet a loose woman.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Oh, God.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: That's a good one.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: You know what, that's my new one. I'm taking that one, too.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Awesome.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: You know what you guys should do? Go to the bookstore at lunch. There's tons of cuties and it's easy to talk to them. 'Hey, what book is that? Cool, let's hang out tonight. Sex already? Whoa...'

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: The bookstore?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: It's that easy?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I'll come with you, show you how it's done.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay, I'll drive.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: My resolution is to read more. And if someone else is driving me to the bookstore, I can eat my PB&J in the car. 2011 is coming up all Darryl.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Hello! Oh, somebody's got a new phone!

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: That is neat.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: I got it for Christmas. I'm so out of my league here.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] E.T. phone Holly. Holly like phone?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Holly misses old phone.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Why?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] New phone is confusing. Gets bad reception.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Bummer.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Bummer.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Reese's Pieces.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Reese's Pieces?

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Oh, God, please stop!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I still have my old phone. This thing... indestructible. [slams phone on desk, phone breaks]

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: [reaches for her cell phone] Oh, I should get this. Hey! Oh, no, don't go see that one, I want to see that together. Yeah, go see that action one. Okay. I love you, too. All right.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Holly doesn't seem to be engaged, but she's talking to AJ like she is. I can't figure it out. Do you think she's already dating a different AJ?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I don't think so.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: When you broke it off with Roy, did you still tell him you loved him?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: But you did still love him.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: I'm not... I'm not going to have...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Do you love him now?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No! Just talk to her.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No. She'd just resent me. Or worse! She would think of me as her friend. [disgusted voice] Oh, hi friend! Blegh.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: I'll talk to her, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You think she'd talk to you?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Why wouldn't she?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: That's true. She's really nice. She'd talk to anybody. Why don't you bring Erin to balance you out?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: There's a plan.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: All right! We should divide up by section. I will take romance and travel.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I'll take the entirety of the second floor.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I got that cutie behind the counter.

quotes.speaker: Bookstore Employee
quotes.text: Well, if you read a lot, you should check out our e-readers. They're really neat.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Whoa, I work at a paper company, those things terrify me. They could put us out of business, you know? I heard those machines hold like, ten books at once.

quotes.speaker: Bookstore Employee
quotes.text: Actually, it's ten thousand.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Holy [bleep], what? Let me see that. It's so light. Like a croissant.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hi.

quotes.speaker: Customer
quotes.text: Hi.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Welcome.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Let us know if you need anything.

quotes.speaker: Customer
quotes.text: Thanks.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Why did we pretend like we work here?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Is that what we were doing?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Hey, how'd you do?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Good!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Good. Real good.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah, yeah!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: We kinda nailed it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah, pretty much. But, you know, this place is kinda tapped out, so. Let's roll.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Cool.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay. What'd you get?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: A book about oceans.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Oh, really? What else? Let me see.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: No, that's uh. Porn. Pornography. Old lady... nasty... porn.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: [whispering] Follow my lead. Hey, want some company?

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Want some company?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Oh, sure. Have a seat. How were your breaks?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Oh, really good, I went to Portugal.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I went to Portugal.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Oh, wow... you went together?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: So, I've just gotta know. What's going on with you and AJ?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Nothing really happened. I mean, I know I made a big deal about this whole New Year's deadline, but um, it came and went... and, we're still together.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: You didn't break up with AJ at all? I mean, not even for a week to make him buy you a present?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: It just wasn't fair of me to give him an ultimatum in the first place. The whole thing is totally my fault. But we're going to be just fine. Just fine.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Whoa! Hold on.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: I am not going back until I fulfill my resolution.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: [Dwight heads toward a strip club] Oh, no, no, no. Uh-uh.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Come on, why not? I've never been in one before. I'm tired of being Mr. Perfect Role Model all the time.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: I'm telling you, don't do it. I've got nothing against strip clubs, but I do have something against them at noon on a Monday. The day shift at a strip club? You can't unsee that.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Well, we can't just go back, I mean, we came out to meet women.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hey, there's a roller rink across the street! There's always chicks at the rink.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: What kind of chicks are you going to meet there?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I don't know. Single moms at a skating party. Sweet sixteen, ten year reunion parties.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Chicks fall down, need help getting back up.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Roller derby practice!

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: We're going skating.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: The goal of this meeting is to get everybody excited about their resolutions! Who's been good about their resolutions so far? Erin. Tell us about it.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Well, my goal was to learn a new word every single day. And I must say that it is going immensely.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Cool! Here's a little 'way to go' gift from Sabre. [tosses Erin a Frisbee]

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Intercepted!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Hey! Gabe.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.text: Whoops.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Creed. I noticed you don't have a resolution on the board. What's yours?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I want to do a cartwheel. But real casual-like. Not make a big deal about it. But I know everybody saw it. Just one stunning, gorgeous cartwheel.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: How is it going?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I'm having a little trouble motivating.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: One of the hardest parts about making resolutions is keeping them. In fact, most resolutions are abandoned by February.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Or sooner.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: That's not a joke.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: But that's okay. Because it's not about being perfect, it's about trying.  In fact, why don't we go around and confess some of the ways that we've fudged on some of our resolutions?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Well, I said that I would eat more vegetables, and I haven't yet. But it's okay. I still have time, since last year, I ate none.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay, well, my confession is that today I had a sip of coffee. But that's fine.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Is it?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes! Because with all of your support, by this time next year maybe I'll be down to one glass of iced tea a week.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Next year? Come-I mean, what is the point? What is the point of that? I made a resolution to floss, and I did it. 12:01, January first, BAM! Blood everywhere.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Well not all of us are Michael Freaking Scott.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: What is wrong with you people? Can't you stick to anything? Erin, I want you to go to the kitchen and get me some vegetables. Creed, you say you want to do a cartwheel? Nothing's stopping you. Come on, old man, do a cartwheel!

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Well, I can't, I don't know how.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You're just gonna somersault around for the rest of your life and you know what's going to be on your tombstone?  Loser.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: My tombstone's already made, thank you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Just do a cartwheel!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: This is all I could find.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [holding broccoli in front of Kevin] Eat it.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: You don't have to do that, Kevin.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I don't know. I'm glad this is happening. Thank you, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Why are you eating stem first?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: This is a new food for me, how else should I eat it?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: The other way.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Can I get some cheese whiz? Or hollandaise?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No. No cheese whiz, no hollandaise, no chocolate sauce, just eat it. Come on. Here comes the airplane, there you go. Open, open, into the hanger, there you go.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Oh, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Eat it. Put it in your mouth, and just eat it.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: God, I hate it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I don't care whether you hate it! You said you'd do it!

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: All right!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Eat it!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: You're killing him, Michael!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: All right, all right, shh!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: All right, I ate the fluffy part, can I be done?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Let me see if you swallowed it, open your mouth. Under your tongue. [reveals hidden broccoli, spits it out] Oh, God! You guys are pathetic.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Can I get some candy, or something?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No! You can't have any candy!

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: I'll get him water.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay, Michael, just settle down.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Holly Flax.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Yes, Michael?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [imitating E.T.] Not Michael, E.T.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: What's up?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well, I just want to talk about what happened in there.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: Oh, no, Michael, I don't want to talk about it with you. I mean, I'm fine, I just... I don't want to talk about it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Holly, come on in. Thanks for coming. I thought there should be an HR rep here for this. So, Kevin and Creed, things got a little bit intense in the conference room.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: You think?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: And I wanted to apologize. These resolutions should be about you, and I made it about me, and it was none of my beeswax.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: You were super mean.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: It was insensitive and I am sorry.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: It was traumatizing, Michael. I wouldn't be surprised if I never ate a vegetable again.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I really wanted you to follow through on your resolutions. The cartwheel, the veggies... I... care about you. Very much. And you loom so large in my heart that I crossed the line.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Okay, Michael, no offense, but you need to get your own life.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You're right. And I hope that we can still be friends.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I don't think I'm there yet, Boss.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Well, I am. [hugs Michael]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay, oh! All right.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I'm going to help you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: DJ
quotes.text: [at the skating rink]Hey, uh. It's just you. Anything you want to hear?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Um... Dave Matthews Band. No hits! Deep tracks only.

quotes.speaker: DJ
quotes.text: Okay. [Ants Go Marching starts playing]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I said no hits!

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: I just feel blocked. Like I'm living, but I'm not...

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hey, Ryan.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: How's your fart project coming?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: That's real, real classy, Kevin. Hey, was it me or you that just shoved the butt end of a pound of broccoli into my mouth because Michael told me to?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Me.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Kevin, don't! Come on!

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Oh, Pam, soda. Caffeine!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yeah, just a little, I have a lot to deal with today.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: [holding a pack of cigarettes] Well, if you don't have to do 'em...

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Meredith, what are you doing? I could be pregnant!

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Okay, no.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: My resolution was to get more attention.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: No, she's lying.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Hey, Ryan. [taps board, makes farting noise]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: One, two, three. [does cartwheel] I did it! I did a cartwheel!

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: [bleep] you! [bleep] you! God!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay, that's it.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [throws resolution board away in dumpster] Lesson learned.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Sup?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hey! Where did you go?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: To the arcade.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Oh, cool.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Why, did you meet someone?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, I did actually. His name is Andy, and he roller skates like a Greek god and you know what? I kinda like hanging out with him.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Right on, son.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Gentlemen.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: And where did you go?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Strip club. I was looking at the strippers at the strip club.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.text: Right.

quotes.speaker: DJ
quotes.text: So, that's it, guys? If you want, I can put on the strobe.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: You want to keep this?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Do you want to keep this?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yup.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Do you want to keep this?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You can toss them.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: My resolution? I never want to make Holly cry again. Unless it's from laughing too hard. Or making love too beautifully.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: We're gonna be just fine. You know how you say something over and over and the words start to sound weird? Going to be just fine... just fine... just fine... just fine...

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.text: I just think we need to cool things down for awhile.  Yeah, a break. At least until I get back to Nashua. Yeah, I'm sure.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Look at where you're going to be doing the cartwheel. So look at where you're going to be placing your hands. So pick a spot.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Mmmhm.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You ready to do this?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Yes, sir.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You know what? I'm going to stay here as long as it takes.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I really appreciate it, Boss.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: It's about you. It's about you. Go!

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I did it!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You did?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: The perfect cartwheel.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: What a rush! That's all I had to do all year.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Congratulations. All right. Well, all right. See you tomorrow.
